text: Joe's Camouflage is a compilation album by Frank Zappa, released posthumously in January 2014 by The Zappa Family Trust on Zappa Records. It represents the first official release of material by a band Zappa assembled for rehearsals in the summer of 1975 but which never toured or recorded material in the studio. ==History== According to the liner notes, the work comprises cassettes of rehearsals (recorded by Denny Walley) and the analog 4 tracks Joe Travers transferred and mixed. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ===Musicians=== * Frank Zappa – lead guitar, vocals * Denny Walley – guitars, vocals * Robert "Frog" Camarena – vocals, guitar * Novi Novog – viola, vocals * Napoleon Murphy Brock – tenor saxophone, vocals * Roy Estrada – bass guitar, vocals * Terry Bozzio – drums Special mention: * Andre Lewis – keyboards, vocals ===Vaultmeisterment=== * Joe Travers for UMRK == References == ==External links== * Category:Frank Zappa albums Category:2015 albums Category:Albums published posthumously
title: Joe's Camouflage
